title: Hell App - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Horror   Mystery   Psychological   Tragedy
tags: Antihero Protagonist   Apathetic Protagonist   Betrayal   Cold Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Dark   Death   Demons   Depictions of Cruelty   Dishonest Protagonist   Distrustful Protagonist   Evil Protagonist   Gamers   Ghosts   Hell   Interdimensional Travel   Lack of Common Sense   Living Alone   Male Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Modern Day   Monsters   Murders   Mysterious Past   Mystery Solving   Near-Death Experience   Psychopaths   Resurrection   Ruthless Protagonist   Sadistic Characters   Selfish Protagonist   Survival Game   Thriller   Torture   Twisted Personality
author: Xuezhiyu Shizhifeng   雪之羽时之风
description:
At his best friend’s memorial service, Bai Yan almost burst out laughing and got beaten to death.

Along the way, Bai Yan’s fits of laughter turned into ones of anger. His joy quickly turned to sorrow as he met his punishment that night.

He curiously opened the app that he had never seen before on his phone and was suddenly pulled into a terrifying world of reincarnation…

An infinite stream of horror flowed into his mind, ominous descriptions, breakthroughs, and storylines.>
